gnetum.config.enabled.tooltip: Determines whether to enable Gnetum, which distributes HUD updates over multiple frames to improve performance.
gnetum.config.showFps.tooltip: Adds a line to the upper-left corner of the F3 screen to show the HUD FPS.
gnetum.config.downscale.tooltip: Uses a lower resolution for the HUD framebuffer based on current GUI scale. May cause HUDs to feel "blurry" and may not be compatible with all mods.
gnetum.config.numberOfPasses.tooltip:
Specifies the total number of passes. Higher number provides better performance, but will make the HUD update slower.

The maximum framerate of the HUD will be the quotient of the game FPS divided by the number of passes.
gnetum.config.maxFps.tooltip: Specifies the maximum framerate of the HUD. Priority is lower than the number of passes setting.
gnetum.config.confirmReset:
Are you sure you want to reset all the configurations?

Resetting the configurations might help solve some issues. However, this action cannot be undone.
gnetum.config.tooltip.auto:
Gnetum will automatically decide whether to cache this element.

Current Status: %s
gnetum.config.tooltip.on: Caching for this element is forcibly enabled.
gnetum.config.tooltip.off: Caching for this element is forcibly disabled.
gnetum.config.analysis.good:
Gnetum is working properly.

When any performance issues are detected, they will show up here.
gnetum.config.analysis.suboptimal: Performance issues found! Click for details.
gnetum.config.analysis.outdated: Performance data is outdated. Come back again after playing for some seconds!
gnetum.config.analysis.noElement: No element is being rendered during pass %d! Consider moving some elements to that pass for the best performance.
gnetum.config.analysis.longDuration: Pass %d is taking too long! Consider moving some elements from that pass to other passes for the best performance.
gnetum.config.analysis.failedDuration: Could not load pass duration data. Please try again later.
gnetum.config.element.minecraft.title: Title Text
gnetum.config.element.minecraft.subtitle: Subtitles
